RumorFact.Text: Solanum asked me to find her on Giant's Deep.

ExploreFact.Text: I found Solanum observing the probe logs.

Solanum feels sad about the Eye of the Universe. She realized that she was right since her childhood - the Eye have no wishes at all. I'm not surprised that she don't want to know anything more about it. One thing that catched her eye here was the active Memory Statue.
